mapper.select:
SELECT store_id,goods_image,goods_commonid,goods_name,goods_price,goods_project_type,publisher_id FROM sy_goods_common WHERE goods_project_type=17 AND goods_state = 1 AND assist_id=0
AND support_county_id IN
#{item}
ORDER BY most_need_sort ASC LIMIT 0,200

SELECT b.goods_commonid,b.goods_name,b.goods_image,b.goods_price,b.goods_state,b.presell_time, b.spec_value,b.goods_areainfo,b.store_id,b.m_fee_rate,b.sale_num,b.publisher_id, b.publisher_truename,b.areaid_3,b.owner_type,b.support_county_id,b.goods_type, IFNULL(b.assist_id,0) assist_id,b.trade_mode,b.transport_id,d.area_name, IFNULL(e.refund_rate,0) refund_rate,IFNULL(e.complain_rate,0) complain_rate, IFNULL(e.send_speed,0) send_speed,IFNULL(e.online_goods_count,0) online_goods_count,f.is_fresh, a.max_buy_num,a.goods_storage FROM sy_goods_common b LEFT JOIN sy_goods a ON a.goods_commonid=b.goods_commonid LEFT JOIN sy_publisher_area c ON b.publisher_id=c.publisher_id LEFT JOIN sy_area d ON c.last_id=d.area_id LEFT JOIN sy_agent_stats e ON b.publisher_id=e.member_id AND e.rec_id=(SELECT MAX(rec_id) FROM sy_agent_stats) LEFT JOIN sy_goods_verify f ON b.goods_commonid=f.goods_commonid WHERE b.goods_commonid=#{goodsCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.gc_id, a.goods_edittime, a.transport_id, a.publisher_truename, a.sale_num, a.goods_commonid, a.goods_addtime, a.goods_name, a.goods_project_type, a.goods_freight, a.goods_image, a.goods_price, a.store_name, a.unit, a.unit_spec, a.store_id, a.spec_name, b.goods_state, b.goods_verify FROM sy_goods_common a,sy_goods b WHERE a.goods_commonid = b.goods_commonid AND b.goods_id=#{goodsId}

SELECT gc.goods_commonid FROM sy_goods g, sy_goods_common gc WHERE gc.goods_state = 1 AND gc.assist_id > 0 AND gc.goods_project_type = 17 AND g.goods_storage > 0 AND gc.goods_commonid = g.goods_commonid AND gc.gc_id IN
#{gcId}

SELECT gc.goods_commonid FROM sy_goods g, sy_goods_common gc WHERE gc.goods_state = 1 AND gc.assist_id = 0 AND gc.goods_project_type = 17 AND g.goods_storage > 0 AND gc.goods_commonid = g.goods_commonid AND gc.gc_id = #{gcId}

SELECT gc.goods_commonid FROM sy_goods g, sy_goods_common gc WHERE gc.goods_state = 1 AND gc.goods_project_type = 24 AND g.goods_storage > 0 AND gc.goods_commonid = g.goods_commonid AND gc.gc_id = #{gcId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sy_goods_common SET sale_num=ifnull(sale_num,0)+1 WHERE goods_commonid= #{goodsCommonid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT publisher_id from sy_goods_common WHERE goods_state = 1;
